params.version: The version that was attempting to be initialized

pullELFees(uint256).details: Only callable by the River contract

params._maxAmount: The maximum amount to pull into the system

InvalidInitialization(uint256,uint256).notice: An error occured during the initialization

Unauthorized(address).notice: The operator is unauthorized for the caller

Initialize(uint256,bytes).notice: Emitted when the contract is properly initialized

SetRiver(address).notice: The storage river address has changed

initELFeeRecipientV1(address).notice: Initialize the fee recipient with the required arguments

pullELFees(uint256).notice: Pulls all the ETH to the River contract

userdoc.notice: This contract receives all the execution layer fees from the proposed blocks + bribes
